record.titleTypeName: Olga Adams Kindergarten and City Planning
record.description: Miss Olga Adams' project to teach city planning. The kindergarten children help make up what should go on these charts.
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Curling. Photographer stamp. Photographs used in Olga Adam's "Children and the City" book, included in the folder 5, box 3.
